column4: hi folks, I have a poweredge 1950 with 2 quad cores and 8gigs. Openbsd and Freebsd are failing to see the gig. Will ubuntu support it?
open and free bsd's work differently than ubuntu.
i had a similar problem, freebsd could not detect the sectors of my hard drive, so it failed. but i have never had a problem with ubuntu or linux in generael.
